item.title: Foobar for real
item.description:
Step 1. Install Hugo

Is this reallife?

Some code:

const letterCapitalize = (input) => {
  return input.split(' ')
    .map((word) => {
      return word.charAt(0)
        .toUpperCase() + word.slice(1);
    })
    .join(' ');
}
